basics.name: Gabriel Mayantz Remes
basics.label: Software developer
basics.summary: I am a FullStack Developer with a specialization in Frontend Angular, showcasing significant experience in the design and development of web applications. My focus lies in Angular, where I have solidified skills, effective collaboration in multidisciplinary teams, and rigorous adherence to quality standards for digital products. My goal is to contribute to project success through the application of best development practices and ongoing learning.
